attributes.action: ban the government's  use  of telephone numbers starting with 084 or 087
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: These are income sharing numbers. Our taxes pay for the services the government departments provide. Why are we being asked to pay more tax through the use of these numbers for government departments' helplines. Will the Prime Minister ask all departments to change their numbers to start with 03 instead of 08?
